participant_1.background:
My first purchase was a bike, so I could enjoy the woods on my own terms.
I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods.
i want to be a doctor.
I dress in a way that is fun and reflects my personality.

participant_2.background:
I loved reading books with my parents at the library during summer.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I'd brag about my famous Harry Potter knowledge to my friends.
i have 5 grandchildren.
Social media is not my thing.

content.text: I love to read as well, but it's been a long time since I've been to the library. What was the last book you read?
I recently read Harry Potter for the 80th time. It's my favorite book series!
I've never read Harry Potter! I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely read it! It's a great series for all ages.
I'll have to put it on my list. What are you doing for Christmas this year?
I'm spending Christmas with my family. I have 5 grandchildren, and we always have a big party.
That sounds like fun! I'm going to be spending Christmas with my family as well.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and biking. I also like to spend time with my friends and family.
I like to read, knit, and spend time with my family. I don't really do social media.
I don't really do social media either. I think it's a waste of time.
I agree. It's more important to spend time with people in person.
